successes.title: Thermodo ~ The Tiny Thermometer for Mobile Devices
successes.description: Thermodo is a tiny electrical thermometer that measures the temperature right where you are. iPhone, iPad, Android & more

Pledges.description: BACKER - Thank you for supporting this project and you will get backer-only updates from the team. Special mention on the website.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - Get one Black edition Thermodo. Hurry up before we run out.
THERMODO - Choose your favorite color. Get one Black or one White edition Thermodo.
PREMIUM - Get one premium anodized aluminum edition Thermodo.
THERMODO + LOOT - Get one Black or one White edition Thermodo, plus one Robocat T-shirt and sticker.
THERMODO SET - Get one Black or one White edition Thermodo and one premium anodised aluminium Thermodo.
PREMIUM + LOOT - Get one premium anodized aluminum edition Thermodo, plus one Robocat T-shirt and sticker.
THERMODO SET + LOOT - Get one Black or one White edition Thermodo and one premium anodised aluminium Thermodo, plus one Robocat T-shirt and sticker.

EARLY ADOPTER + SDK - Get one Black or one White edition Thermodo and receive it as one of the first shipments. Get access to the beta companion app for iOS. Develop your own integration with early access to the SDK.

EARLY PREMIUM + SDK - Get one premium anodized aluminum edition Thermodo and receive it as one of the first shipments. Get access to the beta companion app for iOS. Develop your own integration with early access to the SDK.

THE FAN - Get one Black or one White 
Thermodo, one Robocat T-shirt 
and sticker, early access to SDK 
and iOS app + a signed thanks 
from the team.

CRAZY EARLY PROTOTYPE - Receive one of the few hand made working early prototypes, along with one Black or one White edition Thermodo, plus one Robocat T-shirt and sticker, early access to the beta of the iOS app + SDK and a signed thanks from the team.
THE FAN SET - Get one Black or one White Thermodo and one premium anodised aluminium Thermodo, one Robocat T-shirt and sticker, early access to SDK and iOS app + a signed thanks from the team.

PERSONALIZED PREMIUM - Get one premium anodized aluminum edition Thermodo with your name lasered into it, plus one Robocat T-shirt and sticker, early access to the beta of the iOS app + SDK and a signed thanks from the team.
COPENHAGEN VISIT - Get everything from "PERSONALIZED PREMIUM" and we'll show you around Copenhagen for a day, see the Robocat studio and have a dinner with the team!
PARTNERS - Get everything from "PERSONALIZED PREMIUM" and help us on improving Thermodo's future development. Contact us before pledging.
